title: Bruce Springsteen Soldiers and Sailors Hall - Pittsburgh, PA Nov
description:
Bruce Springsteen  
Soldiers and Sailors Hall - Pittsburgh, PA
November 4, 2011


Source: JVC harddisk cam mpeg2 files > TMPGEnc V4 > VIDEO_TS
Filmer: Toronto Tapers Consortium
Ratio - 16:9
Menu - PC
Chapters - Each Song
NTSC

Video: 8200 kbs 29.97 fps
Audio: AC3 0xbd[0x80]:48000Hz  384 kb/s tot , stereo (2/0) 



(1:09:05)

1) Dancing In The Dark (with The Composure)
2) Your Own Worst Enemy (solo acoustic)
3) Incident On 57th Street (solo acoustic)
4) I'll Work For Your Love (solo acoustic)
5) Darkness On The Edge Of Town (with Joe Grushecky & the Houserockers)
6) Never Be Enough Time (with Joe Grushecky & the Houserockers)
7) A Good Life (with Joe Grushecky & the Houserockers)
8) Code Of Silence (with Joe Grushecky & the Houserockers)
9) Waitin' On A Sunny Day (with Joe Grushecky & the Houserockers)
10) No Surrender (solo acoustic)
11) Does This Bus Stop at 82nd Street (solo acoustic)
12) dream story
13) Surprise, Surprise (solo acoustic)
14) Thunder Road (acoustic with Joe Grushecky)




Notes from the filmer:

We made the trek to Pittsburgh to get a Bruce fix, and brought the camera just in case. This is all we filmed, partly because of security, and partly because we were enjoying ourselves. The footage came out pretty well. Some songs have some obstructions, but for the most part this is nice and clear.  


Notes from me:

This footage has not circulated. It was supposed to be used in a multi-cam dvd but as far I know that never happened. The audio is from the camera. If you're going to upgrade the audio or use the footage for a multi-cam, please respect the credit and it would be great if you got in touch first. Thanks! 

Enjoy!
